Reviews.Title: samsung tl90
Reviews.Author: Eric De Leon "esterlyn"
Reviews.Content: camera is easy to use and you can get an excellent picture without setting anything, its automated, not like other cameras that for every different picture you need to set it even if is on auto. I love the camera but i broke it and got me a canon more expensive and i really regret it and now i got this samsung for my mom and she loves it. Wish i would of got the same one.

Reviews.Title: Camera review
Reviews.Author: Richard P
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use, and I have gotten many good pictures from it.  It is light weight, and easy to carry in my upper pocket, for when I want to take a picture of something.  When I got this camera, I was looking for one that was easy to carry with me, and would be reliable.  This one has worked out fine.

ProductInfo.Features:
Supplied Accessories - Rechargeable battery and AC power adapter, audio/video and USB cables, wrist strap, software CD-ROM
12.2-megapixel effective recording
3X optical zoom (5X digital/15X total zoom)
35mm equivalent focal length - 35-105mm
2.7 LCD screen
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung TL90 12.2 Megapixel Digital Camera - Red
